entry.title: Everybody knows
entry.summary:
Author: LukeWinssmett

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,674Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 150

Summary: The room looks like a cell. It's... a room. Too clean. Too white. A simulation of comfort. Yet, enclosed in a kind of glass box, too big to hold a bed and a few basic things: it's a complete room with a metal door. And in the centre, sitting in a simple chair, is a man.At first, Conner thinks he is an employee. A technician. Someone who angered his father enough to end up locked up. Then the man raises his head. His eyes — blue, intense — open with a mixture of surprise and something more dangerous. Recognition. "Kon-El"

entry.title: but whose heart would not take flight (for sunlight, sunlight, sunlight)
entry.summary:
Author: teeteedee

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,014Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 26

Summary: “Mr. Wayne,” Clark greets, taking the man’s hand in his, “It’s a pleasure to officially meet you.” “Ah,” Bruce says, and even though his lips curl into a smooth grin, Clark can feel his pulse stutter from where his fingertips rest firm on his radial pulse. “Forgive me,” Clark practically purrs, surprising even himself, “How could I forget my manners? Clark Kent, from the Daily Planet.” There's a choking sound next to him, and a quick glance shows a red-faced, bug-eyed Jimmy, and a shrewd Lois looking at him as if he'd sprouted horns. “Mr. Kent,” Bruce says, voice dropping an octave, eyes darkening, “Trust me, the pleasures all mine.” They both smile with entirely too many teeth.

entry.title: You can take the boy from the circus, but you can't take the circus from the boy
entry.summary:
Author: Shelbyino

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,876Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Damian Al-Ghul Wayne had everything at one point. He was a prince. Ibn al Xu'ffasch. Son of the bat. Heir to the demon. He had never asked to be ripped away from everything that he knew, from the warmth of his home, his culture, his palace in Nanda Parbat. He had never asked to be shipped to a gloomy, grey city. Even when his father kept taking in orphans and ruining his plans for inheritance, Damian stood steadfast. But then his father died, leaving behind his newest orphan. A tiny acrobat with watery blue eyes and black curls, who spoke no English. Damian knew the boy never asked to be ripped away from everything that he knew, from the warmth of his home, his culture, his circus troupe. Damian knew he needed to be there for him.

entry.title: Hydroponic Weed
entry.summary:
Author: urlkelley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,885Chapters: 6/23Kudos: 148

Summary: A few months after moving to Gotham for a better job opportunity, Clark realizes it isn't all it shaped up to be. Forced to find a second job to make ends meet, Clark is hired part time at Gotham Men’s Shelter, where he meets Bruce Wayne, homeless and deep in the throes of addiction after the death of his butler and the loss of his father’s company. Could they each be exactly what the other needs, a light in the darkness, a familiar face in a city of strangers? How fine is the line between a helping hand and one that enables?

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 171,871Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 318

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Dark Days and Lost Suns
entry.summary:
Author: Athena_Faymont

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 181,626Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 173

Summary: Clark admires Batman, the man who has given up civilian life to protect everyone else's, the tough, sharp, and compassionate man. Bruce admires Superman, the alien who, despite being able to dominate them all by force, has decided to take care of a planet that isn't his own.And, even with these two flawed principles, neither of them can imagine how alone the other feels... and how alone they themselves are. This is a long story, the superbat fanfic I've always wanted to write about how, within the canon, one day something changes and they find each other. If you want to join me on this adventure, we'll be here every Friday! [Puedes encontrarlo en español en mi perfil.]

entry.title: Stolen bat
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 764Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 246

Summary: “It's always an incident, Big Blue. Or a distraction. Or a moment of calm when you all let your guard down. Batman has protocols for a reason. Follow them!” Superman blushed. "We try, but..." "But?" "Some people are a little reluctant..." Nightwing looked at him, shocked. "They'd rather have Batman kidnapped by some strange alien queen than listen to him?" Superman shrugged even more, in a somewhat unsuccessful attempt to make himself look smaller. "They were sirens this time. Circe..." "I don't care if they were sirens, fairies, or something else, Big Blue! How is it possible that every time there's a League mission, Batman ends up kidnapped?"    (Dick is tired of the perverts trying to kidnap his dad, and how the Justice League did nothing to prevent it.)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,832Chapters: 2/13Kudos: 99

Summary: When Clark is just a teenage superhero, he saves the Wayne family from a tragedy that might have occurred. Years later, after returning from his search for Krypton, everything changes between him and Bruce. A reimagining of Batman Begins and Superman Returns crossover.
